item.title: Bread - Keto Biscuit
item.description: | fat -% | protein -% | net carbs -% | Quick info oven 350 F Ingredients (dry, mix first) 140g Almond Flour (1.5 cup) 1/4 tsp salt 1 Tbsp baking powder 1 Tbsp oat fiber Ingredients (wet, mix second) 2 eggs 1/3 cup sour cream 60g butter (4 Tbsp) 75g cheese (1/3 cup) (cheddar suggested) Directions Preheat the oven at 350F or 180C.
